author: James Martin
method: Place the peas, soya yoghurt, chilli flakes and seasoning into a mini blender and blitz until almost smooth.  To serve, spoon into a bowl with the griddled bread on the side.
ingredients: 50g/2oz frozen peas, defrosted,  50g/2oz soya yoghurt,  pinch chilli flakes,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 slices crusty white bread, drizzled with olive oil and griddled both sides, to serve
